CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 28, 1949, pg. 9, reads: "Celebrating...his third birthday, May 18, and his second year in USA, was handsome little Robert Jean Ross III, center, who is looking forward to being an American citizen on July 4. The party for him was given in the home of Mr. and Mrs. Bradshaw, and had for guests, left to right: Little Linda Sayles, Roslyn Wingfield, Carol Wiggins and Sandra Sayles.  Robert Jean is the son of Mr. and MRs. Robert E. Ross Jr., formerly of Paris, France. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Robert Jean Ross III, center behind cake, celebrating his third birthday with guests, from left: Linda Sayles, Roslyn Wingfield, Carol Wiggins, and Sandra Sayles, in home of Mr. and Mrs. Bradshaw
